abstract: Bangladesh police say four members of opposition Bangladesh Nationalist Party died in clashes with security forces and supporters of governing party supporters in three northern districts; violence occurred even though security was enhanced to prepare for anniversary of re-election of governing party.
lead_paragraph: The deaths occurred despite a nationwide tightening of security in anticipation of violence on the first anniversary of the governing party’s re-election.

byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR

snippet: The deaths occurred despite a nationwide tightening of security in anticipation of violence on the first anniversary of the governing party’s re-election.

headline.main: Four Opposition Activists Die in Clashes in Bangladesh
